mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id as id, b.title, b.writer, b.price, b.sale_price, b.created_date_time, p.publisher_id, p.publisher_name, c.category_id, c.category_name from booktbl b JOIN PUBLISHER p ON b.PUBLISHER_PUBLISHER_ID = p.PUBLISHER_ID JOIN CATEGORY c ON b.CATEGORY_CATEGORY_ID = c.CATEGORY_ID where b.book_id = #{id}
